name: Mobile QA Engineer
description:
At Easybrain, we develop mobile games played by millions of people from all over the world. Right now, we are looking for a Mobile QA Engineer to join our team, who will play a major role in the quality assurance stage of our mobile projects development.

Responsibilities:

Testing the client and server parts of mobile applications.

Requirements:

  • Understanding of the software development and testing process;
  • 2+ years of experience in testing mobile applications for iOS and Android (background in

game testing is a plus);

  • Experience with dev introspection tools that are used to monitor the mobile app state and

activity during the manual testing process;

  • Experience in Rest API testing;
  • Experience in using sniffers (e.g. Charles Proxy);
  • Experience in SQL;
  • Knowledge of mobile-specific features like push notifications;
  • Excellent troubleshooting, problem solving, and analytical skills;
  • Skilled at writing test cases;
  • Knowledge of Russian language is a must;
  • Knowledge of English language - intermediate+.

Optional requirements:

  • Experience with advertising and analytics SDKs;
  • Experience with in-app/subscription purchases with Sandbox;
  • Knowledge of the App Store Review Guidelines, iOS Human Interface Guidelines, and

Material Design Guidelines.

Benefits:

Besides the engaging tasks, support from experienced colleagues, and the opportunity to realize your own ideas, challenge, and drive, we offer:

  • High salary with performance bonuses;
  • Modern office and equipment (remote work during COVID-19);
  • Snacks and drinks;
  • Attendance of key industry events;
  • Medical insurance;
  • Sports reimbursement;
  • English lessons;
  • Relocation package if needed;
  • Fast-paced and easy-going environment.
